summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting an easement to Pacific Northwest Bell Telephone Company across the City of Seattle City Light Department's PNT transmission line right-of-way in the northwest quarter of Section 31, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., King County, Washington (vicinity of NORTH 97TH STREET AND FREEMONT AVE NORT). P.M. 260431-2-309).
